Title: Mortal Kombat
Notes: The original Mortal Kombat game

Title: Mortal Kombat II
Notes: Second main game . Sequel to Mortal Kombat

Title: Mortal Kombat 3
Notes: Third main game . Sequel to Mortal Kombat II

Title: Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3
Notes: An update to Mortal Kombat 3

Title: Mortal Kombat Trilogy
Notes: A game based on the MK3 engine , incorporating all the characters in the series up to that point

Title: Mortal Kombat Mythologies : Sub-Zero
Notes: First of three spin-off games . An action-adventure game starring Sub-Zero . Prequel to the first Mortal Kombat

Title: Mortal Kombat 4
Notes: Fourth main game . Sequel to Mortal Kombat 3 . Last game to appear in arcades

Title: Mortal Kombat Gold
Notes: An update to Mortal Kombat 4 , made for consoles only

Title: Mortal Kombat : Special Forces
Notes: Second of three spin-off games . An action-adventure spin-off starring Jax . Prequel to the first Mortal Kombat

Title: Mortal Kombat Advance
Notes: A port of Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3

Title: Mortal Kombat : Deadly Alliance
Notes: Fifth main game . Sequel to Mortal Kombat 4

Title: Mortal Kombat : Tournament Edition
Notes: Special version of Deadly Alliance , exclusive to the GBA

Title: Mortal Kombat : Deception
Notes: Sixth main game . Sequel to Deadly Alliance

Title: Mortal Kombat : Shaolin Monks
Notes: Third of three spin-off games . An action-adventure spin-off starring Liu Kang and Kung Lao , set in an alternate timeline between MK and MKII

Title: Mortal Kombat : Armageddon
Notes: Seventh main game . Sequel to Deception , and the final title of the original main series

Title: Mortal Kombat : Unchained
Notes: The PSP version of Deception

Title: Ultimate Mortal Kombat
Notes: Another port of UMK3

Title: Mortal Kombat vs. DC Universe
Notes: Eighth main game . A non-canonical crossover title set in an alternate timeline between MKII and MK3

Title: Mortal Kombat ( 2011 )
Notes: Ninth main game . Reboot story combining plots from the original Mortal Kombat , Mortal Kombat II , and Mortal Kombat 3

Title: Mortal Kombat Arcade Kollection
Notes: Compilation of MK , MKII and UMK3 ports
